title: Empire State Building
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 543 words, Level M (Grade 2), Lexile 550L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     V and Z1
description: The Empire State Building has been a hallmark of the New York City skyline since its completion in 1931. This book will fascinate students with information about the building's construction and history.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
